entry.title: Combined summary - Ready for 0.3.23 release?
entry.summary: A developer named Jeff Garzik has sent an email to other developers regarding the final release of version 0.3.23 which has been tested and found to have no major issues. He is seeking confirmation from others for the final release of the version. The email has also been cc'd to some developers who are not on the dev mailing list yet. The email provides the details about the smooth testing of the version 0.3.23 without any complications and suggests that it can be pushed out. The email ends with a request for an ACK (acknowledgment) for the final release of version 0.3.23.
